definition: to hold an office or post
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)
office/duty
term of office/while holding a post

sentences.english: His term of appointment expires in August.
The central meaning of his pontificate is to restore papal authority.
sentences.chinese: 他任职教皇的中心意图就是要恢复教皇权力。

sentences.english: Gao Liren also decides to go eventually rich installs a hospital to hold a post.
sentences.chinese: 高立仁也终于决定去博安医院任职。

sentences.english: Dexter is a serial killer who lends his talent to the Miami Metro Police Department.
sentences.chinese: 德柯斯特是一个连环杀手，在迈阿密警察局任职。

sentences.english: When we met him he had already been commissioned in the provincial army.
sentences.chinese: 我们见到他时，他已在省军中任职。

sentences.english: Eppie Bang is a Senior Financial Analyst at The Nature Conservancy, Florida Chapter.
sentences.chinese: 莫慧秀覝任职大自然保护协会佛州分部高级财务分析。

sentences.english: He has recently arrived on campus.
sentences.chinese: 刚刚来到我们学校任职。

sentences.english: They met while she was on secondment from the Foreign Office.
sentences.chinese: 两人是在她从外交部调来短期任职时认识的。

sentences.english: Have you ever served in any relevant companies of Fubon Financial Group?
sentences.chinese: 是否曾至富邦金控相关子公司任职过？

sentences.english: Finally, Matsushita promotes managerial continuity through long job tenure.
sentences.chinese: 最后松下通过延长任职期，推进管理的延续性。

sentences.english: Walpole encountered increasing opposition the longer his regime continued.
sentences.chinese: 沃波尔的任职期越长，反对她的声音就越大。

sentences.english: He was gazetted to a new regiment.
He used to worked at《WenHui Newspaper》.
I concluded that Judge Bork should not go on the Supreme Court.
sentences.chinese: 我得出结论，博克法官不适合在最高法院任职。

sentences.english: Abe quit after one year in office after an election rout.
sentences.chinese: 安倍任职一年后便在一次选举失利后辞职。

sentences.english: PIMM and JENKINS work at the Nicholas School of the Environment and Earth Sciences at Duke University.
sentences.chinese: 皮姆与简金斯任职于杜克大学的环境与地球科学学院。

definition: to transfer/to move to another post
to be promoted to
key job/important position
post/position/job/duties
to hold several jobs at once/concurrent post/working part-time
to take up a post/to start in a new job
term of office/while holding a post
to hold a governmental office or post/to assume office of/to take charge of/to serve as
to appoint/(job) appointment/CL:紙|纸[zhi3]
to take office/to assume a post
to hold an office or post
temporary assignment to a Chinese government or CCP post
(of one person) to hold the successive posts of/(of several persons) the successive (presidents etc)
to take over (as minister, manager etc)
post/office/position
office/duty
